hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Lox is an expansion board for the BeagleBoard for Amateur "Ham" Radio internet linking. It controls 2 simplex nodes or 2 repeaters, completely replacing the PC normally used. This node controller runs AllStarLink and EchoLink only. Lox gives direct access to the on board audio hardware of the BeagleBoard
hopobject.shortdesc: An expansion board for the BeagleBoard that gives direct access to the on board audio hardware.
